lines.text: I am an officer, but I'm traveling incognito.
I thought you came in a bus.

[being dealt the Ace of Spades]
That's a bad card, isn't it?
I'm full of romance, must be this tavern, the fireplace. I feel so poetic, I could make love to a snowman.
If that Justice of the Peace doesn't show up, the chances are you'll have to.
Do you have a fireplace here?
We have a fireplace, but it's inside.
Well I suppose if the fireplace won't come to us, we'll have to go to it.

[Harrison's been attacked and is dying]
The cards DIDN'T lie.
Is this better than chasing petty thieves through a department store I ask?
Oh, starting to answer your own questions, huh?
